title: Sen. Menendez Case Revolves Around Friendship With Florida Eye Doctor
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish speaks with Jay Weaver, a reporter for the Miami Herald, for a profile on Dr. Salomon Melgen, who is at the center of Sen. Robert Menendez's indictment on corruption charges.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
